dc_title_s: James T. Hair Company's Map showing the territory covered by their hotel register business in that part of the United States : from the Hudson River and Atlantic Ocean on the East, West to and including Eastern Washington, Eastern Oregon, Nevada, and Southern California.
dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:4,435,200. 70 miles to 1 inch (app.); 1 map: color; 53 x 79 cm Hotels--United States--Maps
